column2: 32.  Furthermore,  the  above  contention  cited  by  the  Learned  Counsel
appears  to  have  been  taken  out  of  context.  It  lacks  foundation  as it
processes and the basis of the judgment rendered.
33.  Due to the aforesaid reasons, I am not inclined to interfere with the
conviction  and  the  disputed  judgment  together  with  the  sentence
34.  I accordingly dismiss the appeal and make no order regarding cost.
35.  The Registrar of this Court is directed to communicate this judgment
to the High Court of Matara for compliance.

column4: Judge of the Court of Appeal
Judge of the Court of Appeal
